current_step.name: Verifikasi implementasi
current_step.description: Memastikan dashboard member dapat diakses dan berfungsi dengan benar.

decisions_made: Decided to use existing MemberController and its dashmixDashboard method.
Decided to create views/member/dashboard.php for the dashboard view.
Decided to modify routes.php to point /dashboard to MemberController::dashmixDashboard().
Decided to refactor MemberController by removing the redundant index() method and renaming dashmixDashboard() to index().
